alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 11 at 4:14PM CDT until May 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nebraska, including the following counties, Dawson, Franklin, Furnas, Gosper, Harlan and Phelps. * WHEN...Through 7 AM Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The potential for training thunderstorms could bring locally heavy rain to areas that have received at least a few inches of rain over the past couple of days. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
